revised_title: Edgar Johnson Allen: A Pioneering Director of the Plymouth Marine Biological Association
tldr: Edgar Johnson Allen was a dedicated and influential director of the Plymouth Marine Biological Association, who devoted his life to growing the institution and supporting marine biological research. Despite facing financial challenges and limited resources, Allen's passion for research and commitment to the laboratory allowed it to flourish and become a renowned center for marine biology.
